text.headline: My birthday
text.text: I was born in Ensenada, a coastal city located in the state of Baja California, Mexico.

text.headline: Bachelor of Computer Science, Nonlinear optimization
text.text:
Grade: Computer Science Bachelor

Activities and societies: My thesis is "WebAssembly library construction for investment portfolio optimization using efficient evolutionary algorithms". Read a draft on Overleaf.

My favorite projects:

  • Introduction to algorithms notes
  • Visualize Graph Theory in a Maze (WebGL)
  • Theory of computation. Visualize Grammars, Compilers, and Automata

Full list of projects available on GitHub.

text.headline: Part-time Entrepreneur at Arsus
text.text:
A startup that delivered food within my college. I used Angular and Firebase. I achieved 500 users and a profit.

https://dev.azure.com/CEST-Arsus/ArsusEnterprise

media.caption: Centro de Investigación y de Estudios Avanzados

text.headline: Research summer at Centro de Investigación y de Estudios Avanzados del IPN
text.text:
I participated in Programa Delfín at CINESTAV 2022, under the guidance of Carlos Coello, P.hD. During the program, I studied Evolutionary Algorithms and their application in solving optimization problems. As part of the research, I worked on the development of a non-dominated set generator CLI tool, which is available on Non dominated set generator CLI.

Skills: Evolutionary Algorithms · Optimization · CLI tool development · Git

media.caption: Centro de Investigación y de Estudios Avanzados del IPN
Sistema Institucional de Indicadores de Investigación y Posgrado (SIIIP)

text.headline: Digital Transformation Internship at Universidad Autónoma de Baja California
text.text: During my 1 year 9 months internship at UABC, I worked with Kubo, Ph.D. to develop a business intelligence system using PostgreSQL, Linux, Laravel, React.js, GraphQL, and Docker. The system provides UABC research insights and can be accessed at https://siiip.uabc.mx/. My skills utilized during this project included PostgreSQL, Linux, relational databases, teamwork, React.js, and Laravel.
